evaluation_rubric.description: The generated content must be in perfect alignment with the Brand Foundation Document, correctly applying the specified framework, voice, and linguistic rules.
The content must successfully fulfill all aspects of the creative_brief provided as input, including asset_type, target_pillar, and call_to_action.
The content must be engaging and persuasive, featuring a strong hook, a clear narrative arc, and a compelling call-to-action.
The output must be valid JSON, adhere to the schema, and the metadata section must be an accurate reflection of the generated_content.
